website_summaries.verdict: This hoodie not only comes in many colors, it also is reliable at wicking away moisture while providing warmth and comfort.
pros: Has soft fleece inside with dri-power technology on the outside, keeping wearers warm and wicking moisture
Choose from a myriad of colors
Doesn’t shrink or pill in the wash. Drawstrings are braided and have aglets to protect ends
cons: Runs a bit large, if between sizes, size down

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It came in handy for my sisters and I who recently walked in the making strides breast cancer walk. Kept us nice and warm
customer_reviews.author: bree

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and feel, wish it were a little softer though. Also I'd like it to shrink a bit but I don't want the sleeves to shorten at all... maybe I'll just air dry it. I'm 5'9 180lbs and bought a large
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Love this Hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoodie about 5 months ago. Since then, I've used it while travelling, running, and even sleeping. It's so comfortable and multi-functional, and the "Dri-Power" technology works wonders. Even when I run and sweat the hoodie stays dry and comfortable. I like it so much that I'm buying another one for a friend. Just a note on size, though....I normally wear a size medium shirt, but in this hoodie, I'm a SMALL. So just note that the sizes run bigger.
customer_reviews.author: ADwyer

customer_reviews.title: Great hoodie, totally worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I love this gold GT hoodie. The color is fantastic and the fit and quality are amazing. I am 5'10" and 200 lbs and the XL fits me just right. I bought this hoodie to cut the sleeves off and wear on top of my UA compression shirt for my workouts but the color and fit are so good that I'm not going to cut it and I'll wear it out with jeans. I looked at some cheaper hoodies that don't come lose to this quality. It was a little more expensive but totally worth it. I bought it in grey also.
customer_reviews.author: Wagger

customer_reviews.title: Got this hoodie after my cat died
customer_reviews.text: Literally I ordered this hoodie to come before we had to put my 17 year old kitty down so I had something cute soft and comfy to lounge in for 2 days after while I grieved LOL
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Good weight and color
customer_reviews.text: This hoodie sweatshirt is a good weight for So California's cooler days and the Texas Orange (not too bright an orange) is a nice color. I'm a 5'2",117 lb female and the Small was a good size with enough room to layer.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better
customer_reviews.text: Feels very nice. I use it for my workouts in the gym. It really is great and fits true to size. I'm 5"8 135lbs and ordered a large. Fits nicely and it does feel a bit bigger but that's what I was going for I like it to feel that way.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Guizar

customer_reviews.title: It's soft on the inside and made of good material. I ordered teal/turquoise and the color is ...
customer_reviews.text: Fiance is a size medium usually. I ordered a medium and it is only slightly tight, especially around the hip area (he's thin and has larger shoulders). It's soft on the inside and made of good material. I ordered teal/turquoise and the color is true to the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Y.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Possibly one of my favorite sweatshirts ever. I'd consider it medium weight and the color was just as advertised. Excellent value for the price. I've looked at other color options and will likely purchase one or two more in other colors. Fit just as expected. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: mlb1028

customer_reviews.title: Forgot how large they're cut.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 255lbs and normally wear an 18 or xxl in shirts. I looked at some of the customer reviews and decided to order down to a xl. Still too big. Ordered a large and it fits decently. I only returned one for sizing. Bought 5 and I'll donate the others to the homeless. I wore these many years ago and forgot the good quality and warmth. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Influential

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great hoodie for the price. Comparable to hoodies costing much more
customer_reviews.author: RMD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Loose enough to be comfortable but not excessively loose to look sloppy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan S

customer_reviews.title: buy a size down unless you like extra baggy
customer_reviews.text: love the feel of this sweatshirt. I usually wear medium but got a small and I am glad with the choice. very cozy. The neck might be just slightly high but doesn't bother me. that could be because I am used to zip up hoodies where I can zip down the neckline.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Hoodie, Too Heavy and Bulky
customer_reviews.text: The Russell Athletic pullover is warm, well made and fits comfortably. However, it is too heavy and bulky for me, and having a painful and sensitive neck, I cannot wear it because of the weight bearing down on my head when the hood is up. Healthy people should not have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Indian Cook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for winter
customer_reviews.text: Love these hoodies. I have 4 of them in different colors. Keep me warm with an undershirt. Plain and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great quality material
customer_reviews.text: Awesome hoodie.. This banana color is just right my taste. Russell is better quality material than champion.. 💯
customer_reviews.author: Martin Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Russell Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson and it fit him well and he liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Sheaffer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very warm and soft sweatshirt. It wears quite well. This is my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: It fits me perfect. It's a little oversized but
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hoodie just to have an extra hoodie to wear for my trip to Tennessee in December. I received it today and I am obsessed. I will probably will this everywhere even with the Florida heat...I ordered it in a small and I am usually a medium in women's sizes. It fits me perfect. It's a little oversized but, that's how I wanted it to fit. I will be purchasing a few more colors!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it but somewhat big and oversized on the arms and armpit area.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: An excellent color.
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for the good product. Second time I've bought one.
customer_reviews.author: Lacrimatorium

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite hoodie
customer_reviews.text: I have an almost nearly identical Russell hoodie I got at Sprawl-Mart that I feel like disowning after getting this hoodie. It's cozy warm, the so called wicking fabric actually works ok for a cheap cotton hoodie, and I love the color. I'm contemplating buying another one just because. So you probably should too.
customer_reviews.author: BS AZ

customer_reviews.title: I had our logo embroidered on the front and know I have to worry about players stealing it from me they all love it so much
customer_reviews.text: Vegas gold is one of our school colors. Finding it in my size is hard to do most of the time. I had our logo embroidered on the front and know I have to worry about players stealing it from me they all love it so much. I believe in Russell products they are our sole provider of cloth for our team.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, different color
customer_reviews.text: The teal is way different from the picture....much darker...kind of disappointed about that. Make sure to wash before you wear....I turned green.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great sweatshirts
customer_reviews.text: I have like four of these sweat shirts good quality great price have to get more as my wife likes mine too seem to fit as size indicates I'm 6'1 170# and a large fits me perfect
customer_reviews.author: SKY-KING

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a deal !! I ordered it late Saturday nite and received it Monday. Very good Russell brand quality and a great price on the Auqua color. The size fit was true
customer_reviews.author: K Dog

customer_reviews.title: Returns were made easy, so I can't complain
customer_reviews.text: These are heavy and run large, especially around the mid section. If your a slim guy there might be too much room. Returns were made easy, so I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Spyda

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Soft, Great Color
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hoodie. Took it on a surf fishing trip and it kept me warm all day. Fit perfectly. I ordered a men's small and it fit me (a 5'3'' adult woman). Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice and loose
customer_reviews.text: This is cut with a relaxed fit and is very soft, ordered a size M, I'm a woman and wear a size 8 and it does cover my rear so I can wear it with leggings and feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lina10

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this hoodie. It is so soft and so comfortable. I ordered the teal color and love it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: My Husband Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my hudband for his birthday, and he wears it all the time now. It is hard to find hoodies for him, as he is tall and skinny - so they are either too short or too wide. This hooded sweatshirt is good in length and width, and the sleeves aren't too short for him either. I would buy this item for him again, and I probably will once this one wears out.
customer_reviews.author: K. Carmassi

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The color and style is as pictured. I bought this hoodie for my daughter and added vinyl lettering. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Nice hoodie. A tiny bit on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Nice hoodie. A tiny bit on the small side, though. Not enough to prevent me from wearing it or anything.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice & thick material, just a lil snugg for big boned people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, definitely a good hoodie to have in your closet or car just to throw on whenever.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: A very heavy hoodie!
customer_reviews.text: The XL is more XXL so large. But really really warm, and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: David  MoralesTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: Color is off from picture
customer_reviews.text: The picture on Amazon is not the color of this sweatshirt. The color pictured is what I was looking for, the color I received was more of a darker navy color. Not a bad color, but not what I thought I was ordering. Seller was great to work with.
customer_reviews.author: deacsrider

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: what a great value in russell athletic sweatshirts....the colors are terrific, the fit is perfect and the sweatshirt seems to be very well made...haven't washed it yet, but I don't think there will be a problem
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best made hoodie under $50
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best made hoodie under $50. Excellent quality and the fit is much more stylish than any other in it's price range. Only American giant sweatshirts are better but they are $89.
customer_reviews.author: Texcl

customer_reviews.title: Pink, pink, pink!
customer_reviews.text: I am broadening my horizons and wearing colors that are generally considered more feminine. I've always liked pink and now I have great hoodie! It awesome that you make a men's hoody in pink.
customer_reviews.author: dnichisti

customer_reviews.title: Nice, warm Hoodie
customer_reviews.text: It fits nicely, and warm enough to work for cooler weather. I'm a large guy, and ordered appropriately. The ONLY problem I have with this shirt is a problem that I often have, the neck-hole is more snug than I would like. Other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Buddha

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sweatshirt in a great aqua color. I tend to like men's sweatshirts better than woman's because I'm tall. Women's are usually too short for my liking... I want it to be comfy and be able to layer under or over it.
customer_reviews.author: Scrufnik

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, color not what expected.
customer_reviews.text: It's great and warm. Color was off from what I expected. Much darker, thought it leaned more towards a mint but it was like a darker blue.
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Great hoodie! Love the fit
customer_reviews.text: Great hoodie! Love the fit, color, quality, price, and delivery. I would definitely recommend this product. Have ordered several items already. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dpj1012

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Soft comfortable inner lining and sizing is correct!! I'm so happy with this purchase. As long as the price stays at $23 free shipping, don't hesitate to get it. Price is perfect for the quality :)
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: Great hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Color was a little off but the quality and comfort was there! It was a little darker than the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca H

customer_reviews.title: going green!
customer_reviews.text: going to modify it for my Halloween costume! good fit for later too!
customer_reviews.author: lori n.k. morikami

customer_reviews.title: plus very good material and very warm highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected I'm a xl guy and i got 2xl and it fits a lil big so this sweater wont come small, plus very good material and very warm highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Not gold!
customer_reviews.text: The color is not as pictured, it's more of a greenish yellow than a gold. And they won't let me exchange it, just refund and send it back and by the time I do that I lose $. So not happy about this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie

customer_reviews.title: For my son
customer_reviews.text: He is a very picky dresser so when I asked about it he told me he uses it all the time and it is durable enought to take the abuse sweatchirts take, he is almost ready for another one in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and not as thinner as you might expect
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: good hoodie for the money
customer_reviews.text: good hoodie for the money .. cool colors ... haven't washed it yet , so not sure about fade and shrinkage yet
customer_reviews.author: Micah Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Gold means pastell yellow
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sweatshirt in "gold" but it is straight up Easter,pastel yellow. Looks kinda funny for a 4XL man. The size is good and it seems well made. Took about a week to get here though.
customer_reviews.author: Momazon

customer_reviews.title: Great sweatshirt
customer_reviews.text: Feels soft and comfortable. Great color, exactly as pictured. I would give it a 6 star, but with this sweatshirt, the shoulders are always wider (hangs off shoulder)- I just wish it was a bit more narrower.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nicehoodie
customer_reviews.text: True to fit, runs justo a little big, if you are thin just pick smaller size, the only thing is the sleeves are a wide but easy to fix
customer_reviews.author: Enrique v

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter in a size large. Normally she wears an XL in women's clothes and this fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: CathywithaC

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Russell sweatshirts are great! You can always count on them to be consistent. Can't find them in the local stores anymore. Love to be able to order them on Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Sveum

customer_reviews.title: Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a larger size. fit as i expected it to. always wear it during cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Santos

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I got a bunch of different sweatshirt for my son and he loves them all. Nice and warm, great colors, pockets to keep hands warm. They're perfect for what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: noel

customer_reviews.title: Glad I took note...
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad that I took note of all the other reviews. I got a 2X for my son who normally wears 3X and it was perfect. Nice sweatshirt for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DMMH

customer_reviews.title: It fits fine, but the inside leaves the occasional fabric fluff ...
customer_reviews.text: It fits fine, but the inside leaves the occasional fabric fluff on my shirt when I take off my sweatshirt. For Little Mac cosplayers, yes, this looks good, but sweatpants is a pain to find in this color...
customer_reviews.author: Wong

customer_reviews.title: Decent hoodie
customer_reviews.text: Nice hoodie. Fit as expected. Color was bright and cheerful. Did leave some lint on clothing underneath.

customer_reviews.title: Good hoodie

customer_reviews.title: Liked them so much, we ordered more.
customer_reviews.text: Great weight. Nice colors. Russell seems to run a little larger than other sweatshirts. Usually order xl, needed large in Russells.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not the best quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this hoodir for a couple weeks. I've worn it a total of two times, haven't put it through the wash yet, and the stitching is coming out in multiple spots. Definitely not the best quality.

customer_reviews.text: I'm wearing this sweater right now, I'm all about it. Fit's hella comf. Ain't got no worries sheeeeeet. I would however argue that the hood on this sweater is a tad tight. I'm more accustomed to floppy jedi hoods.

customer_reviews.title: inconsistent sweatshirts
customer_reviews.text: this color is not my favorite but it's OK I got the gold. I ended up giving this to goodwill because it fits a little snug in the shoulders and i'm a girl with normal shoulders.. russell sizing is sometimes inconsistent because it's a little cheap so it can be hit and miss. for whatever reason when i ordered black in the same exact size and sweatshirt it fit me much better so i still wear that one a lot. also they pill very easily so they won't last as long as they should.

It worked out OK, but I definitely won't be buying it again.

product_meta.title: Russell Athletic Men's Dri-Power Pullover Fleece Hoodie
product_meta.description: Whether you're working out, running errands or just relaxing at home, this versatile hoodie will keep you comfortable. Made with medium-weight fleece, featuring our signature Dri-Power moisture wicking technology to keep body heat in so you can stay warm and dry. Ribbed waistband and cuffs offering a secure fit, a front pocket offers convenient storage. Drawstring hood easily adjusts to provide additional protection from the weather. Grab this hoodie and go.
feature_bullets: Medium-weight 9 oz fleece keeps in body heat so you can stay warm
Dri-Power moisture wicking technology keeps you dry
Muff pocket for storing phone, keys or other small items
Ribbed waistband and cuffs provide a secure fit
Drawstring hood easily adjusts to provide additional protection from the weather
